docs.content: import Button from '@/components/Button' # Button This is a Button ## Props | Name | Type | Default value | Description | |--------------|---------------|----------------|------------------| | theme | string | primary | button type | | size | string | md | button size | | disabled | bool | false | disable button | | loading | bool | false | loading button | | icon | string | - | button icon | ```jsx import Button from '@occmundial/atomic/dist/Button' function Component() { return ( ) } ```

import Card from '@/components/Card'

# Card

This is a Card

```jsx
<Card>This is a card</Card>
```

<Card>This is a card</Card>
